content.header1: We Can't Wait for Sunday Morning
content.text1: We gather on Sundays across multiple locations for teaching, music, prayer, and volunteering. We make space for spiritual seekers to come and ask questions, connect community, and explore faith.

We keep it simple. Our Sunday morning services are 60 minutes long. You can wear whatever clothing is comfortable. We’ve got coffee ready to go in the lobby, show up a few minutes early to grab a cup and find a seat. Our services begin with about 15 minutes of music, where we join together to sing songs about Jesus. There is a live band, and the lyrics are projected onto the screen. After this we share a few announcements and stories about what’s happening, followed by 40 minutes of Jesus-centred teaching. We’ve got notes and Bibles ready for you so you can follow along as we learn together. Once the service is done, we typically hang out to chat, connect, and maybe have a snack. You are welcome to take off, or stay as long as you’d like. Curious about our Sunday morning teaching?

content.text1: We work together to create a safe community where our kids and youth can learn to love and follow Jesus. We do this through building relationships, equipping parents, and developing our own curriculum.
